content: crochet a cute and functional double thick potholder for your kitchen with the summer sunsets potholder pattern this potholder uses the moss stitch - a combination of the single_crochet and chain stitch that works so well with variegated and self-striping yarn this is a double sided and double thick potholder that you can use safely in your kitchen > this potholder pattern is part of the ** 2024 potholders galore crochet-along 1 ** and with the purchase of an ebook you will receive a total of 13 potholder patterns one pattern every two weeks during the crochet-along if you d like to be notified when new potholder patterns are released in the crochet-along you can join the ** 2024 crochet along email list here 2 ** the free pattern for the summer sunsets potholder can be found ** here 3 ** the complete video tutorial can be found ** here 4 ** you can learn more about the potholders galore crochet along ** here 5 ** skill level advanced beginner language english crochet terminology us terms crochet stitch chain slip_stitch single_crochet size this potholder includes two sizes 7 25 x 7 25 and 8 x 8 instructions are provided to customize the size of your potholder > materials * 4 0mm crochet hook needed * any medium 4 worsted weight 100% cotton yarn * scissors * yarn needle * 2 stitch markers or safety pins > yardage * size #1 135 yds / 123 m * size #2 180 yds / 165 m > yarn note 100% cotton or wool yarn is recommended for potholders because they don t burn under extreme heat cotton blends and other fibers like acrylic should not be used i hope you enjoy making your potholders 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/potholders-galore-crochet-along-2024 2 https //thispixiecreates myflodesk com/pgcal 3 https //thispixiecreates com/moss-stitch-potholder/ 4 https //youtu be/ho-fkxf9lii 5 https //thispixiecreates com/2024-potholder-crochet-along/
